original_text: Then he put wood on the altar. He cut the bull into pieces and he put the pieces on top of the wood. Then he said to the people, ‘Fill four large jars with water. Pour the water all over the offering and the wood.’
korean_text: 또 나무를 벌이고 송아지의 각을 떠서 나무 위에 놓고 이르되 통 넷에 물을 채워다가 번제물과 나무 위에 부으라 하고

sentences.original_text: Then he put wood on the altar.
He cut the bull into pieces
and he put the pieces on top of the wood.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 조각들을 나무 위에 올렸습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then he said to the people,
Pour the water all over the offering and the wood.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그 물을 제물과 나무 위에 모두 붓십시오.'
